content: pairs of machine seams hem the sleeves and sew nicely to the wrong side and along the short edges make a loop as follows chain 13 using col 1 and crochet hook size 2 mm single_crochet 12 sts sew the loop to one side of the sleeve slit button loop make another loop the same and sew to the slit on the other sleeve neckband using col 1 and larger needle knit up sts along the neck k 1 row on the ws and at the same time adjust the stitch number to 137 137 137 151 151 sts work border acc to diagram k b&f k 1 row on the ws = folding row change to smaller cir needle and work st st for 4 5 cm for facing bobble sew in the sleeves sew in the zipper zipper facing co 44 sts using col 1 and work 5 row st st b&f bobble make another facing the same sew the facing on each side of the zipper zipper embellishment using col 2 and smaller dp needles co 2 sts and work in the round as follows *slide the sts to the right on the needle tighten the yarn on diagram a / lower body border page 6 the back and k 2 sts* repeat between *-* until the piece measures 10 cm bobble diagram b / back i page 7 double the cord and pull through the zipper pull and tie as a fringe see picture diagram b / front i
